item.description:
For those of you that have enjoyed our ballroom dancing classes, our teacher Christine is shaking it up a little for the cold dark month of January.  Let's get out, learn something new, and have some fun!

Come join us for a 5 week group class where we will learn different country line dances.  No experience required.

As the weather gets yucky, please bring a different pair of shoes to dance in so we don't track in water/snow/salt/etc.

Park in the lot behind The Fours. The studio entrance is hard to find- it's in the alley to the left of The Fours and has a canopy over the door that reads "Danceworks".

$10/class

 

*CHANGE* - please note that we will be learning a different line dance every week so you do not need to attend all if you cannot.  Also payment will be different than in the past because of this- pay per class, not all upfront.

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Country line dancing - 5 week group class
